title: Cricket: Technique #450 Thermal Brush 3 1/4"
description: Technique Thermals feature tourmaline ionic bristles that infuse moisture into the hair shaft and scalp. Heat resistant static free bristles eliminate fly away hair and utilize antimicrobial protection against bacteria growth. Hair sectioning pick conveniently stores in the base of suede-like grip. With this brush you have it all at your fingertips.

title: Mally Beauty Volumizing Mascara, Black .39 fl oz (10 ml)
description: This unique formula helps create the look of gorgeous, full, luxurious lashes. The combination of natural waxes and carefully chosen powders gives lashes an instant boost. The plush brush works with the powders in the formula to help thicken lashes without clumping; giving you gorgeous volume that lasts and lasts.
brand: Mally Beauty Volumizing Mascara, Black .39 fl oz (10 ml) (BOXED)

title: CheekRoom Facial Cleansing Pore Brush NO1 selling Authentic Pore Brush
description: Brush cleansing will revive your tired skin to glow by removing dirt, make-up, dead skin cells and opening clogged pores.New & Improved 410,000 soft bristles are densely aligned on the brush for deep cleansing with minimal irritation.Using the Cheekroom pore brush will remove all dirt and dead skin cells and boost your circulation to increase blood flow to the cells to restore skin's vitality.Bristles are bacteria resistant and the plastic handle is resistant to mold and breakage.-How to use:1. Wet the brush under running water2. Apply small amount of facial cleanser to the brush3. Gently apply the brush to your face moving in a circular motion. Note, do not press hard as it will be counterproductive.4. Because of the soft bristles, you may use this brush several times a day without irritation (however, depending upon facial cleanser used irritation may occur so we recommend natural chemical free cleansers)6. After use, hang brush to dry. Because of patented antimicrobial design of the bristles, bacteria do not form.
